question: What is the maximum assistance given for the production of Jute foundation seed under the technology mission on Jute and Mesta?
explanation:
The maximum assistance given for the production of Jute foundation seed under the technology mission on Jute and Mesta is
(i) 50% of the cost limited to Rs.3000/- per quintal for foundation seed production.
(ii) 25% of the cost limited to Rs.700/- per quintal for Certified seed production.
(iii) 50% of the cost limited to Rs.2000/- per quintal for certified seed distribution.
